review: I , 66 years old met dr on 31st July 2024 for viral fever, extreme weakness n body pain and m grateful today 6th day n Dr Ashish K Jain got my crippled condition under control .. I strongly recommend Dr.Ashish K Jain for his knowledge, experience, right diagnosis and precise treatment..He is very understanding, compassionate and friendly Doctor who answers all queries n explain everything in detail for my clinical  satisfaction .. my blessings to him for success in all his endeavours. Regards-KumKum Mehrotra
reply_text: Thank you so much! Praying for your speedy recovery üôå

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I found Dr Ashish possessing a razor sharp mind. In my very first phone call to him, he was able to identify my case as one of likely Dengue, even before any testing was done. He was proved correct. Then, on an ongoing basis, he ensured proper handling of my hydration, platelet and other parameters. He explained the linkage of Hemoglobin and hydration and other nuances to me. All in all, he handled my case very admirably and I am very happy to recommend him as a General Physician.
Very prompt and supportive. Got my tests done and called me to tell what to do. Kept on advising me on WhatsApp as well.

Satisfied with the given treatment 
Doctor is very friendly 
Easily available for online consultation

review: He  is very approachable & compassionate. consulted him for my mother.  Was impressed with his treatment. Was advised hospitalization by other Doctors. He treated my mother without hospitalization in quick time. He was available for guidance & quite patient in listening & clearing doubts. Quite impressed. will strongly recommend.

review: Excellent Diagnosis by the doctor every time visited Dr Ashish K Jain. He is polite and gives enough time to all his patients.

Dr. Ashish Jain has been a great doctor for me. He listens carefully to the issues and explains everything and why he prescribes tests and medications. He also responds to my questions after the appointment. So far everything he has diagnosed has worked out well and I have not had any problems since. Thank you Dr. Ashish!
Doctor treat as a family member, excellent doctor, I recommend to all this doctor, he is explain good of disease

*** ** *** **** ********Dr. Ashish gave me the confidence that I will get well. Very helpful person and ready to solve your innumerable query with patience. He is available when needed. Overall had a very good experience.

Very helpful and communicative doctor. Helped with my fathers treatment during terminal care . Very empathetic and responded at all times to our queries which is quite rare these days. We are grateful to him and recommend him positively.

Very good Dr,
Very patient and hears the all the issues related to the sickness,
Goes over and above his job in explaining the reason for the sickness and how to avoid it from happening in the future

Young super enthusiastic and right prognosis - we went for my dad and he was very prompt. He got the correct other expert doctors.
